snippet: George Hincapie, the five-time Olympian and longtime aide for Lance Armstrong during the Tour de France, will retire from cycling after the 2012 season.
abstract: George Hincapie, the five-time Olympian and longtime aide for Lance Armstrong during the Tour de France, will retire from cycling after the 2012 season.
lead_paragraph: George Hincapie, the five-time Olympian and longtime aide for Lance Armstrong during the Tour de France, will retire from cycling after the 2012 season.

headline.seo: U.S. Cyclist George Hincapie to Retire After 2012
headline.main: U.S. Cyclist George Hincapie to Retire After 2012
